text: it was the case that shocked immigration
officials a child squeezed into a bag
being smuggled into Europe when they
unzipped it they found the boy visibly
distressed but he managed to tell them
he was 8 years old and from the Ivory
Coast one month on and it's all smiles
the boy named ado is finally being
reunited with his mother since his
discovery care workers have been looking
after him at this youth center in suitor
Eddie's mother was accompanied by a
cousin and lawyer his father is
currently in jail on human rights abuse
charges for trying to have him smuggled
into the country it all unfolded when
guards spotted nervous-looking Moroccan
woman waiting in line to cross the
pedestrian border into the enclaves they
suspected she was carrying drugs add
whose father was arrested when he
arrived to collect his son on the other
side of the water both parents live
legally in Spain their lawyer says the
father knew nothing of the suitcase plan
and had paid for a visa his bail has
since been paid and the family are
hoping he'll be released soon to join
them Katerina moe BBC News
